{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[disturb]]; to [[trouble]]
# {{lb|zh|literary}} [[confused]]; [[disordered]]
# {{lb|zh|polite}} to [[receive]] [[money]], [[good]]s or [[food]]; to enjoy hospitality
